item.title: 使用hugo在github上打造個人網頁
item.description: 使用hugo在github上打造個人網頁 前言 之前一直是用wordpress加self host的方式，但後來覺得整個架構變得很麻煩，想說最近很流行直接在github上放自己的網頁就來試試看啦。 BTW, 本篇文章預設讀者大致知道Unix shell cmd與git操作 建立一個github repo 主要就repo name得是account加上.github.io 安裝hugo (使用macOS) brew install hugo 安裝完之後就可以了 新增自己的個人網站 hugo new site the-note the-note 是我自己取的名字可替換成任意名稱 選擇主題 hugo 主題上有許多不同的主題可以選擇，選擇Download後會直接跳轉到對應主題的github頁面，直接clone到themes資料夾就好 編譯網站 the@THEs-MacBook-Pro: ~/myblog: hugo server -t hugo-theme-stack --buildDrafts Start building sites … hugo v0.102.0+extended darwin/amd64 BuildDate=unknown WARN 2022/08/29 21:21:08 Search page not found. item.title: K8s device plugin mechanism in kubelet
item.description: Device Plugin register options k8s device plugin mechanism allows user to add custom devices to increase pod usage flexiable. We can find many use cases such as SRIOV(Single Root I/O Virtualization) and GPU. This post will introduce about the device plugin in kubelet and what’s the procedure to register hardware to kubelet from device plugin. DevicePluginServer In device plugin server, it defines gRPC interfaces: // DevicePlugin is the service advertised by Device Plugins service DevicePlugin { // GetDevicePluginOptions returns options to be communicated with Device // Manager rpc GetDevicePluginOptions(Empty) returns (DevicePluginOptions) {} // ListAndWatch returns a stream of List of Devices // Whenever a Device state change or a Device disappears, ListAndWatch // returns the new list rpc ListAndWatch(Empty) returns (stream ListAndWatchResponse) {} // GetPreferredAllocation returns a preferred set of devices to allocate // from a list of available ones.
